com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
Class ChangeScope<T extends EObject,D extends IScribblerDomain>

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.ChangeScope<T,D>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the target DeployModelObject that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
D - The type of the IScribblerDomain that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
public class ChangeScope<T extends EObject,D extends IScribblerDomain>
extends java.lang.Object

A ChangeScope provides a simple abstraction for dealing with scribblers, undo, and etc. and also manages the underlying resource reference counts. The ChangeScope is model specific through generics.

Since:
1.0

Field Summary
static int OPTION_DO_NOT_SAVE
          Indicates the results of the operation should not be persisted regardless of the underlying model sharing.
static int OPTION_FORCE_SAVE
          Indicates that the results of the operation should always be saved, regardless of whether the underlying model is shared with other clients.
static int OPTION_SAVE_IF_UNSHARED
          Indicates the results of the operation should only be saved if no other clients of the model are holding a resource.

Method Detail

findChangeScope

public static <TargetDMOType extends EObject,ScribblerDomainType extends IScribblerDomain> ChangeScope<TargetDMOType,ScribblerDomainType> findChangeScope(IAdaptable info)
Provides a convenient method to fetch a ChangeScope from an IAdaptable element.

Type Parameters:
TargetDMOType - The type of the target DeployModelObject that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
ScribblerDomainType - The type of the IScribblerDomain that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
Parameters:
info - An adaptable element passed in through an IUndoableOperation#execute(IProgressMonitor, IAdaptable) method that is expected to know about a ChangeScope.
Returns:

createChangeScope

public static ChangeScope<Topology,DeploymentTopologyDomain> createChangeScope(IFile topologyFile)
Create a ChangeScope on the given file. Any model access will use the shared resource loaded in memory.

Parameters:
topologyFile - The IFile of the Topology resource on disk.
Returns:
A ChangeScope using the Topology contained in the given IFile as its getTarget().

createChangeScope

public static <TargetDMOType extends EObject,ScribblerDomainType extends IScribblerDomain> ChangeScope<TargetDMOType,ScribblerDomainType> createChangeScope(TargetDMOType dmo,
                                                                                                                                                            ScribblerDomainType domain)
Create a ChangeScope on the given DeployModelObject.

Any model access will use the shared resource loaded in memory, but bump the reference count for this ChangeScope's usage.

Type Parameters:
TargetDMOType - The type of the target EObject that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
ScribblerDomainType - The type of the IScribblerDomain that is expected to be managed by the returned ChangeScope.
Parameters:
dmo - The target of the operation, which will be available from the {getTarget() method of the returned ChangeScope.
domain - The scribbler domain that describes the set of associated files managed under this ChangeScope.
Returns:
A ChangeScope typed to the given DeployModelObject with all necessary reference counts.

createChangeScope

public static <ParentDMOType extends EObject,TargetDMOType extends EObject,ScribblerDomainType extends IScribblerDomain> ChangeScope<TargetDMOType,ScribblerDomainType> createChangeScope(ChangeScope<ParentDMOType,ScribblerDomainType> parent,
                                                                                                                                                                                          TargetDMOType dmo)
Create a ChangeScope on the given DeployModelObject.

Reuse the reference counts held by the given parent ChangeScope.

Type Parameters:
P - The type of the parent ChangeScope that was already created.
C - The type of the object that will be the target ChangeScope.
Parameters:
parent - A parent ChangeScope that already has its own reference count that will be shared by the new child ChangeScope.
dmo - The target of the operation, which will be available from the {getTarget() method of the returned ChangeScope.
Returns:
A ChangeScope typed to the given DeployModelObject with all necessary reference counts.

openModel

public <RootModelType extends EObject> RootModelType openModel(IFile modelFile,
                                                               EClass eClass)
Open a model contained in the given modelFile. The return type will be inferred from the type of the variable that the result is assigned to. The given eClass will determine the type of object to create if necessary.

Type Parameters:
RootModelType - The expected model type that will be found in the given modelFile.
Parameters:
modelFile - A handle to the IFile that contains (or will contain) the model.
eClass - The EMF Class of the type to be returned (defined on the EPackage of a given EMF model).
Returns:
An instance of the type eClass.getInstanceClass() contained in the shared EMF resource for given modelFile

createModel

public <RootModelType extends EObject> RootModelType createModel(IFile modelFile,
                                                                 EClass eClass,
                                                                 InitializeModelOperation<RootModelType> initializeOperation)
                                          throws ExecutionException

The initializeOperation will be called on a child ChangeScope of this ChangeScope, whose target will be the newly created root model object. For instance, if you call this method with: 

 
 MyRootType root = createModel(file, MyPackage.eINSTANCE.getMyRootType(), initOp);

Then initOp will be called on a child ChangeScope (thus it will *not* bump the reference count), and that ChangeScope.getTarget() will return a instance of the type MyRootType.

Use findChangeScope(IAdaptable) to return an instance of ChangeScope where RootModelType is determined by this method and D is determined by this ChangeScope.

Type Parameters:
RootModelType - The type of the expected root model.
Parameters:
modelFile - The file that will contain the root model.
eClass - The meta class for RootModelType.
initializeOperation - An operation to execute if the model object must be created. The operation will be supplied with the instance of the root object (of type eClass.getInstanceClass()) to properly configure.
Returns:
An instance of the type eClass.getInstanceClass() contained in the shared EMF resource for given modelFile
Throws:
ExecutionException - If a problem occurs or any status other than OK is returned from the create operation.

openTopology

public Topology openTopology()
Open the Topology that is managed by this ChangeScope. If this ChangeScope was created with parent (see ChangeScope#createChangeScope(ChangeScope, DeployModelObject), then the reference count will not be incremented as a resul of this method. Otherwise, the reference count of the shared resource will reflect the client's usage.

Returns:

createTopology

public Topology createTopology(java.lang.String namespace,
                               java.lang.String topologyName,
                               IProgressMonitor monitor)
                        throws ExecutionException
Creates a new Topology in the resource identified by this ChangeScope, but does not persist the new model.

Parameters:
namespace - The namespace to create the Topology within. Note that the actual contents of the Topology will be persisted in the IFile that this ChangeScope knows about regardless of the namespace given.
topologyName - The name of the Topology to create
monitor - A progress monitor to provide feedback to the user about the current step of the operation.
Returns:
The Topology that was created as a result of this method or the cached version if already created.
Throws:
ExecutionException - If a problem occurs while creating the Topology.
See Also:
#saveChangesAndClose(boolean, IProgressMonitor)}

getScribbler

public IEditModelScribbler getScribbler()
Return the scribbler used by this ChangeScope to maintain a reference count against the model.

Returns:
The scribbler used by this ChangeScope to maintain a reference count against the model.

getTransactionalEditingDomain

public TransactionalEditingDomain getTransactionalEditingDomain()
Find or create the proper TransactionalEditingDomain to use when creating operations to execute against the model.

Returns:
The proper TransactionalEditingDomain to use when creating operations to execute against the model.

execute

public IStatus execute(IUndoableOperation op,
                       IProgressMonitor monitor)
Executes the given operation passing this ChangeScope as the IAdaptable arguments. Exactly equivalent to execute(op, OPTION_DO_NOT_SAVE, monitor).

Parameters:
op - The operation to execute against the model managed by this ChangeScope. The ChangeScope will pass itself as the IAdaptable argument of the IUndoableOperation#execute(IProgressMonitor, IAdaptable) method.
monitor - A progress monitor to provide feedback to the user about the current step of the operation.
Returns:
The status returned from the operation after execution.

execute

public IStatus execute(IUndoableOperation op,
                       int saveOptions,
                       IProgressMonitor monitor)
Executes the given operation passing this ChangeScope as the IAdaptable arguments.

Parameters:
op - The operation to execute against the model managed by this ChangeScope. The ChangeScope will pass itself as the IAdaptable argument of the IUndoableOperation#execute(IProgressMonitor, IAdaptable) method.
saveOptions - Indicate whether the results of the operation should be persisted after execution via OPTION_DO_NOT_SAVE, OPTION_FORCE_SAVE, OPTION_SAVE_IF_UNSHARED,
monitor - A progress monitor to supply to the operation.
Returns:
The status returned from the operation after execution.

undo

public IStatus undo(IUndoableOperation op,
                    IProgressMonitor monitor)
Executes the given operation passing this ChangeScope as the IAdaptable arguments. Exactly equivalent to execute(op, OPTION_DO_NOT_SAVE, monitor).

Parameters:
op - The operation to execute against the model managed by this ChangeScope. The ChangeScope will pass itself as the IAdaptable argument of the IUndoableOperation#execute(IProgressMonitor, IAdaptable) method.
monitor - A progress monitor to provide feedback to the user about the current step of the operation.
Returns:
The status returned from the operation after execution.

saveChanges

public IStatus saveChanges(boolean force,
                           IProgressMonitor monitor)
Save the changes that have been executed until this point.

Parameters:
force - True indicates that change a save should occur even if the underlying resource is shared.
monitor - A progress monitor to supply to the operation.
Returns:
The status from the save operation.

saveChangesAndClose

public IStatus saveChangesAndClose(boolean force,
                                   IProgressMonitor monitor)
                            throws ExecutionException
Save the changes that have been executed until this point and close the scribbler.

Parameters:
force - True indicates that change a save should occur even if the underlying resource is shared.
monitor - A progress monitor to supply to the operation.
Returns:
The status from the save operation.
Throws:
ExecutionException - If any problems are encountered during execution.

Save the changes that have been executed until this point.

Parameters:
monitor - A progress monitor to supply to the operation.
Returns:
The status from the save operation.
